channel.title: Port problems
channel.description: Ok well my server is up and operational, as far as I know. On runelocus's status checker it says online. But It wont let me log in. Yes i have changed all the ips back to local ip on my personal client. Because when i go to uturrent and change connection preferences to port 8080 i can log in but the server goes offline. How do i fix

item.title: Port problems
item.dc:creator: @Mr.czar Mr.czar
item.description:
@Mr.czar wrote:

Exit utorrent use your router or some other type utorrent is a good type to port with, as it will randomly stop working at times. Also make sure the firewalls on your computer are off completely.

Read full topic
